channel.title: Aws Cloudwatch on Anand vyas
channel.description: Recent content in Aws Cloudwatch on Anand vyas

item.title: AWS CloudWatch
item.description: Amazon CloudWatch is a service that monitors AWS Cloud resources and applications running on AWS. It collects and tracks metrics, collects and monitors log files, and sets alarms. Amazon CloudWatch has a basic level of monitoring for no cost and a more detailed level of monitoring for an additional cost.

item.title: AWS Elastic Load Balancing
item.description: Elastic Load Balancing automatically distributes your incoming application traffic across multiple targets, such as EC2 instances. It monitors the health of registered targets and routes traffic only to the healthy targets.
